description: Please Note. I used an extractor to format my log. To fix wazuh logs, replace _ with . eg (Change agent_name to agent.name in Grafana). Other than just using Kibana, You can use Elasticsearch data source to visualize Wazuh - COMPLIANCE Dashboards. I prefer Grafana because it loads faster and allows me to consolidate multiple data sources, such as Prometheus and InfluxDB, into a single source of truth.
title: WAZUH - COMPLIANCE
